org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation
[Groovy] Class CloneOp

java.lang.Object
  org.ajoberstar.grgit.operation.CloneOp
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Callable
class CloneOp

Clones an existing repository. Returns a Grgit pointing to the resulting repository.

To clone a repository, checking out the master branch.

 def grgit = Grgit.clone(dir: 'gradle-git', uri: 'git@github.com:ajoberstar/gradle-git.git')
See git-clone Manual Reference.
See Also:
Since:
0.1.0

Property Summary
boolean bare

true if the resulting repository should be bare, false (the default) otherwise.
boolean checkout

true (the default) if a working tree should be checked out, false otherwise
Credentials credentials

The username and credentials to use when checking out the repository and for subsequent remote operations on the repository.

java.io.File dir

The directory to put the cloned repository.
java.lang.String refToCheckout

The remote ref that should be checked out after the repository is cloned.

java.lang.String remote

The name of the remote for the upstream repository.

java.lang.String uri

The URI to the repository to be cloned.
 
Method Summary
Grgit call()

Property Detail

bare

boolean bare
true if the resulting repository should be bare, false (the default) otherwise.

checkout

boolean checkout
true (the default) if a working tree should be checked out, false otherwise

credentials

Credentials credentials
The username and credentials to use when checking out the repository and for subsequent remote operations on the repository. This is only needed if hardcoded creds should be used.
See Also:
org.ajoberstar.gradle.auth.AuthConfig

dir

java.io.File dir
The directory to put the cloned repository.

refToCheckout

java.lang.String refToCheckout
The remote ref that should be checked out after the repository is cloned. Defaults to master.

remote

java.lang.String remote
The name of the remote for the upstream repository. Defaults to origin.

uri

java.lang.String uri
The URI to the repository to be cloned.
